Branded Patent
Our Company

    ZHIWEI NC TECH CO Ltd is a professional manufacturer of electrichairs since2007,first company with the self developed controller"ZW CN2 Controller" patented in China,Specialied in electric power wheelchair and parts. 

    All product passed ISO13485;CE;SGS.Wheelchairs covers 20 provinces in China and mainly export to the Middle East countries.

    All Wheelchairs are sold direct from our factory in DongGuan,no middleman,saving money for you.         

    Welcome to visit our factory at any time!                                                                     

     

Spare  Parts

            24AH Lead-acid Battery

                               PG Controller

                  Brushless Controller

Delivery

The transportation of wheelchair

tahere are three choices:express door to door;air transport;sea transport

By Air

The express door to door is suitable for less than 5 wheelchairs,it'll take about 3 days.

You can received the wheelchairs at home,very convenient.

The air transport is suitable for 5-10 wheelchairs,it'll take about 3 days,but you need to pick up the wheelchairs at the airport.

By Sea

Sea transport is suitable for more than 10 wheelchairs,it'll take about 15 days.

And you need to pick up the wheelchairs at the port,the shipping cost is really attractive,but it'll take longer time.

FAQ

1)Q:The guarantee?

   A:The frame is for 3 years,battery,motor,controller and other parts are for 1 year.

2)Q:The delivery time?

   A:Usually 15 days after your payments confirmed

3)Q:The payment method?

   A:T/T;Western Union;Paypal;etc.
